Thu: Could you pass me a diaper?
Fri: Working with the kids is fun,well..only working with the good ones is fun.
Sat: I hate when the bad kids come here.
Sun: I can't wait for nap time, I need one too.
Fri4: I don't know if the kids can have icecream,I know they'd love it.
Mon8: I don't think I want kids,what if mine turns out to be evil?
Fri8: I've seen too many parents not even come back.
Sat10: The parents work so much that the kids are calling me mommy now.
summer_1: It's very hot in here, good thing we have a fan.
summer_Mon: I know I should be on summer break but I also live here.#$b# Also the some parents never came back.
summer_Tue: The shopping center in MiniTown is very nice.#$b# I even bought a new dress for my date.
summer_Wed: A #$b# B #$b# C...#$b# It's stuck in my head today.
summer_Sun: Could you pass me a juicebox?
summer_Thu4: Want to have kids? #$b# Just take one of them that they left behind.
summer_Fri6: Nice today..I mean nice day today. #$b# Sorry I'm tired.
summer_Wed8: Does anyone in town want kids?
fall_Wed: A kid went missing.#$b# Don't worry I found him in the wall...
fall_Sat: Sometimes Jas and Vincent comes to visit.
fall_Thu2: I could go for a nice large meal right about now.
fall_Fri6: What's going on today with you farmer?
fall_Mon4: I bet you wondered why there was no kids in town besides Jas and Vincent.#$b# I don't know either.
fall_Wed8: Is it just me or are the kids never growing up?
fall_Thu10: I have a cold, but don't worry. #$b# I took my cold medicine.
winter_Mon: We're good friends right? #$b# I can barely go out and make friends these days.
winter_Tue: You're welcome to stop by and take some kids home.
I think these kids need a real home.
winter_Wed: Are you ok today? #$b# You just look tired.
winter_Fri: Why do I watch kids as a job? #$b# Good question because I don't know.
winter_Sat: I do like my job,just not the bad kids. #$b# Luckily they went missing.
winter_Sun: I sent the kids to a faster home but..#$b# They ended up back on my doorstep.
winter_Fri4: I-I'm starting to think these kids are human.
winter_Tue4: One of the kids had a grin from ear to ear, #$b# and had sharp teeth. #$b# When I checked again, it was gone.
winter_Thu10: We built a snowman the other day,the kids had so much fun.
